How to create a fairy tale?
Come up with a name and choose\n a cover for your fairy tale
Players make their moves in turns.\n and can only come up with one sentence

The game can be played by 2 to 8 people.
 - Players make their moves in turns.
 - The order is determined at the very
 beginning of the game and corresponds
 to the order in which the player’s
 name is written when he is added
 to the game.
 - A player can come up with only one sentence.
 - The sentence is limited to 60 characters.
 - Any player can finish the game after
 each of the participants in the game
 has made at least 1 move.
 There are three levels of difficulty for the game:
 1. Easy. All previously composed sentences are visible
 to all participants in the game at any time.
 2. Medium. The player sees only the last sentence
 composed by the player before him.
 3. Hard. The player sees only the last sentence
 composed by the player before him.
 In his turn the player must use
 the randomly generated mandatory word.
